alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 13 at 1:14PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The following area, Skagway River near Skagway. * WHEN...Until 700 AM AKDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Possible isolated landslides in areas of steep terrain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 111 PM AKDT, river gauge reports indicate rises in water levels from heavy rain in areas near the parking lot along the Skagway River. Minor flooding is expected to begin shortly, especially near the Skagway River. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible. - Areas near the parking lot along the Skagway River are the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - For Skagway Power: At 12:37pm the stage was 25.55 feet. Flood Stage is 26.5 feet.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
